mapper.select:
SELECT USR.ADMIN_ID AS usrId , USR.ADMIN_NAME AS usrName , USR.ADMIN_GRP_SEQ AS usrGrpCd , GRP.GRP_NAME AS grpName , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(USR.ADMIN_TEL_NO),'BRC') as CHAR) AS phoneNo , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(USR.ADMIN_MPN_NO),'BRC') as CHAR) AS mpnNo , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(USR.ADMIN_EMAIL_NAME),'BRC') as CHAR) AS email , USR.DEPT_NAME deptName , DATE_FORMAT(USR.CRE_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDate , USR.USE_YN AS useYn FROM TB_SYS_ADMIN AS USR INNER JOIN TB_SYS_GRP_CD AS GRP ON USR.ADMIN_GRP_SEQ = GRP.ADMIN_GRP_SEQ AND GRP.READ_AUTH_CD IN ('RAA', 'RAM') WHERE USR.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND USR.DEPT_NAME LIKE CONCAT(#{searchDeptName}, '%')
AND USR.ADMIN_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{searchUsrId}, '%')
AND USR.ADMIN_NAME LIKE CONCAT(#{searchUsrName}, '%')
ORDER BY USR.CRE_DTTM DESC
LIMIT #{startLimit}, #{endLimit}

SELECT COUNT(USR.ADMIN_ID) FROM TB_SYS_ADMIN AS USR INNER JOIN TB_SYS_GRP_CD AS GRP ON USR.ADMIN_GRP_SEQ = GRP.ADMIN_GRP_SEQ AND GRP.READ_AUTH_CD IN ('RAA', 'RAM') WHERE USR.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND USR.DEPT_NAME LIKE CONCAT(#{searchDeptName}, '%')
AND USR.ADMIN_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{searchUsrId}, '%')
AND USR.ADMIN_NAME LIKE CONCAT(#{searchUsrName}, '%')

SELECT ADMIN_ID AS usrId , A.ADMIN_GRP_SEQ AS usrGrpCd , A.ENC_PWD AS encPwd , ADMIN_NAME AS usrName , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ADMIN_TEL_NO),'BRC') as CHAR) AS phoneNo , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ADMIN_MPN_NO),'BRC') as CHAR) AS mpnNo , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ADMIN_EMAIL_NAME),'BRC') as CHAR) AS email , DATE_FORMAT(CRE_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDate , USE_YN useYn , EMAIL_RECV_YN , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ADMIN_CARD_NO),'BRC') as CHAR) AS ADMIN_CARD_NO , ACCS_CTRL_YN , ACCS_CTRL_PUBL_IP , ASSIGN_STATION_ID , ASSIGN_STATION_GRP_ID AS assignStationGrpId , ASSIGN_CENTER_ID , B.GRP_NAME , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ADMIN_CARD_PWD),'BRC') as CHAR) AS adminCardPwd , RELOCATE_CAR_ID AS relocateCarCd , TEAM_SEQ , (SELECT CENTER_ID FROM TB_SYS_TEAM_INFO T WHERE T.TEAM_SEQ=A.TEAM_SEQ) AS CENTER_ID , (SELECT TEAM_ID FROM TB_SYS_TEAM_INFO T WHERE T.TEAM_SEQ=A.TEAM_SEQ) AS TEAM_ID FROM TB_SYS_ADMIN A, TB_SYS_GRP_CD B WHERE A.ADMIN_GRP_SEQ = B.ADMIN_GRP_SEQ
AND A.ADMIN_ID = #{usrId}
SELECT count(*) FROM TB_SYS_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{usrId}
SELECT count(ADMIN_CARD_NO) FROM TB_SYS_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID <> #{usrId} AND ADMIN_CARD_NO = HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{admin_card_no},'BRC'))

SELECT count(MB_CARD_NO) FROM TB_SVC_MB_CARD WHERE CARD_USE_CLS_CD = 'R' AND MB_CARD_NO = HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{admin_card_no},'BRC')) AND END_DTTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SYS_ADMIN SET ASSIGN_STATION_ID = '', ASSIGN_CENTER_ID = '', ENC_PWD = '', ADMIN_TEL_NO = '', ADMIN_MPN_NO = '', ADMIN_EMAIL_NAME = '', LOGIN_FAIL_CNT = NULL, ADMIN_CARD_NO = '', ADMIN_CARD_PWD = '', EMAIL_RECV_YN = 'N', USE_YN = 'N', ACCS_CTRL_YN = '' WHERE 1=1 AND ADMIN_ID = #{adminID}
mapper.select:
SELECT ADMIN_ID AS usrId , USE_YN AS useYn , MOD_ID AS mod_Id , MOD_DTTM AS modDate FROM TB_SYS_ADMIN_USE_HIST
WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{usrId} ORDER BY ADMIN_USE_HIST_SEQ DESC
